snippet: Iran’s defense minister on Friday confirmed that Iranian warplanes had fired shots at an American drone last week but said they had taken the action after the unmanned aircraft had entered Iranian airspace.
abstract: Iran’s defense minister confirms that Iranian warplanes fired shots at American drone, but says action was taken after unmanned aircraft entered Iranian airspace.

byline.original: By THOMAS ERDBRINK and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Thomas Erdbrink reported from Tehran, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: Iran’s defense minister on Friday confirmed that Iranian warplanes had fired shots at an American drone last week but said they had taken the action after the unmanned aircraft had entered Iranian airspace.

headline.seo: Iran Confirms Firing on U.S. Drone, Saying It Entered Airspace
headline.main: Defense Minister Confirms Iran Fired on U.S. Drone
headline.print_headline: Defense Minister Confirms Iran Fired on U.S. Drone

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
